accommodations.name: Sunrise Arabian Beach Resort
pros: Snorkel from jetty is super fun and easy
Rules for pools and coral protection
cons: Main restaurant area is open and smoky
Noise between rooms was an issue
Loud neighbors interrupted sleep on several nights
accommodations.evelinaComment: Palju häid reitinguid (Lots of good reviews)

accommodations.name: White Hills Resort
cons: Permanent speakers at lobby and main pool
Music can be heard from almost everywhere
Vibe Club keeps guests up until 3:30am
Loud party until 11pm (note for families with kids)
accommodations.evelinaComment: MEGAILUS HOTELL (GORGEOUS HOTEL) - but major noise concerns

accommodations.name: Sharm Hills Luxury Pool View
cons: Nearest beach (Adrenaline Beach) is hard to reach
Very far from main road, difficult without car
accommodations.evelinaComment: Tundub päris hea variant, kaaluks tugevalt (Seems like a good option, would strongly consider)

flights.notes: Charter flight - best value direct option

rejected.name: Baron Palms Resort
rejected.reason: Mingi kahtlane hais on hotellis (Suspicious smell in the hotel)

rejected.name: Royal Grand Sharm
rejected.reason: Inimesed lasevad bassu ääres mussi, overall kõva muusika, pole otseteed randa (People kissing by the bass, overall loud music, no direct path to beach)
